summary: Even before the pandemic shifted the balance between in-office and remote work, federal agencies struggled to identify and let go of unneeded space. Operating unused space has unnecessary financial and environmental costs—one reason federal property management has been on our High Risk List since 2003. We found that 17 agencies' headquarters buildings were at 25% capacity or less in the first 3 months of 2023...
title: Federal Real Property: Agencies Need New Benchmarks to Measure and Shed Underutilized Space
